ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Rejected URIs

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi, 
you might want to check 
# Enable logging of uris rejected by scope by=
 setting level to INFO.
# org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.LinksScoper.lev=
el =3D INFO

in heritrix.properties.

Gabriel Vasile

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: sriram_varahan1 
  To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Saturday,19 June, 2010 7:08 AM
  Subject: [archive-crawler] Rejecte=
d URIs


    
  Hello,

  Is there any log in Heritrix which is written to =
when an URI is rejected if it falls outside the domain. 

  I checked out t=
he existing logs but am not able to find this information being written to =
anywhere.

  Is there any tuning I need to do to the log level in the loggi=
ng.conf?

  Thanks,
  Sriram.
